Header: Boralesgamuwa police officer arrested for alleged bribery
Content: A police sergeant stationed at the Boralesgamuwa police station as the OIC of traffic has been arrested for allegedly accepting a bribe. Investigation Officer of the Bribery Commission Priyantha Chandrasiri said that the alleged bribe was taken in order to not take legal action against a lorry that was transporting sand with an expired licence. The suspected police officer was arrested at the instance where he allegedly accepted Rs.1,500 of a Rs. 5000 bribe allegedly requested by him.
